TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Sipazi’, title = Sipazi’, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sipazi’} }

S.FORM: Sipazi' Itiniay i Wufeng Cen no Hsinchu ko Sipazi' a niyaro', 126 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 377 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 93% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 349 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 7% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 28 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal71%, Saysiyat19%, Amis1%, Bunun1%.

Sipazi' Itiniay i Wofeng Cen no Hsincho ko Sipazi' a niyaro', 126 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 377 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 93% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 349 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 7% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 28 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal71%, Saysiyat19%, Amis1%, Bonon1%.
